summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddItem (string ItemText, object Index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddItem([in]string ItemText, [in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Sub AddItem (ItemText As String, Optional Index As Object)

param.name: ItemText
param.span: 要添加到组合框列表中的值。

span.span: Value to be added to the list in the combo box.

param.name: Index
param.span: 从 0 开始计数的值，指定新项目在列表中的顺序。

span.span: A 0-based value that specifies the order of the new item in the list.

summary.span: 向列表中添加项目，另外为显示在列表中的新项目指定索引。

span.span: Adds an item to the list, optionally specifying an index for the new item to appear in the list.

span.para: 如果值等于或大于数的列表中的元素，新项目将添加到列表末尾。
If the value of is equal to or larger than the number of elements in the list, the new item will be added to the end of the list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 的自动调整大小以显示完整的内容的控件。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that automatically sizes the control to display the entire contents.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性的默认值为False。
设置AutoSize为True自动将组合框中显示区域的宽度设置为 text 的长度。此行为类似于单行文本框中。
The default value for this property is False.
Setting AutoSize to True automatically sets the width of the display area to the length of the text in the combo box. This behavior is similar to the single-line text box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoTab { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 的指定控件已填充到指定的最大长度时是否自动插入一个制表符。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies if a tab is inserted automatically when the control has been filled to the maximum length specified.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性的默认值为False。
The default value for this property is False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoWordSelect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 的指定用于扩展选定内容的基本单位单词还是将字符。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies whether a word or a character is the basic unit used to extend a selection.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为True。
The default value is True.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::UInt32 BackColor { System::UInt32 get(); void set(System::UInt32 value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个UInteger (C# 中uint ) 值，指示该控件的背景色。

span.span: Returns or sets a UInteger (uint in C#) value that indicates the background color of the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性为OLE_COLOR是UInteger (C# 中uint ) 值的类型。此属性的默认值是 0x80000005，"窗口"。
This property is of the type OLE_COLOR which is a UInteger (uint in C#) value. The default value for this property is 0x80000005, "Window."

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlBorderStyle BorderStyle { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlBorderStyle get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlBorderStyle value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置定义的控件周围的边框样式的常量。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant that defines the style of the border around the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为olBorderStyleSingle。
The default value is olBorderStyleSingle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Clear() runtime managed

summary.span: 从组合框列表中删除所有对象。

span.span: Removes all objects from the list in the combo box.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Copy() runtime managed

summary.span: 将控件的内容复制到剪贴板上。

span.span: Copies the contents of the control to the clipboard.

span.para: 数据复制以无格式的文本格式，替换剪贴板的现有内容。
如果控件样式为olComboBoxStyleListBox，则此方法将当前选定内容中下拉列表复制到剪贴板。
The data is copied in unformatted text format, replacing the existing contents of the clipboard.
If the control style is olComboBoxStyleListBox, then this method copies the current selection in the drop-down list to the clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cut() runtime managed

summary.span: 删除控件的内容并将内容复制到剪贴板。

span.span: Removes the contents of the control and copies the contents to the clipboard.

span.para: 的数据复制到剪贴板中无格式的文本格式，替换剪贴板的现有内容。
如果控件样式为olComboBoxStyleListBox，则此方法不会剪切任何内容。
The data is copied to the clipboard in unformatted text format, replacing the existing contents of the clipboard.
If the control style is olComboBoxStyleListBox, then this method will not cut anything.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlDragBehavior DragBehavior { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlDragBehavior get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlDragBehavior value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常量，指示系统是否启用此控件的拖放功能。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant that indicates whether the system enables the drag-and-drop feature for this control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为olDragDropDisabled。
The default value is olDragDropDisabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DropDown() runtime managed

summary.span: 展开组合框的下拉部分。

span.span: Expands the drop-down portion of the combo box.

span.para: 模拟用户单击下拉按钮控件上。此方法会导致触发事件。
Simulates the user clicking the drop button on the control. This method causes the event to fire.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool )，该值指示是否允许控件才能正常。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates if the control is allowed to function.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为True。
The default value is True.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlEnterFieldBehavior EnterFieldBehavior { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlEnterFieldBehavior get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlEnterFieldBehavior value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置进入控件时指定的选择行为的常量。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant that specifies the selection behavior when entering the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为olEnterFieldBehaviorSelectAll。
The default value is olEnterFieldBehaviorSelectAll.

public: property stdole::StdFont ^ Font { stdole::StdFont ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回 StdFont 表示用来呈现控件中的文本的字体。

span.span: Returns a StdFont that represents the font used to render the text inside the control.

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 字体表示为 Microsoft Windows 类型stdfont。
The font is expressed as the Microsoft Windows type stdfont.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::UInt32 ForeColor { System::UInt32 get(); void set(System::UInt32 value); };

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性为OLE_COLOR是UInteger (C# 中uint ) 值的类型。此属性的默认值是 0x80000008，"窗口文本"。
This property is of the type OLE_COLOR which is a UInteger (uint in C#) value. The default value for this property is 0x80000008, "Window Text."

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetItem([in]int32 Index) runtime managed
Public Function GetItem (Index As Integer) As String

param.name: Index
param.span: 从零开始计数的值，指定项目在列表中的位置。

span.span: A zero-based value that specifies the location of an item in the list.

summary.span: 获取一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值，该值代表组合框控件列表中指定位置处的项目。

span.span: Obtains a String (string in C#) that represents an item at the specified location in the list of the combo box control.

returns.span: 一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值，该值代表列表中的指定位置处的项目。

span.span: A String (string in C#) value that represents the item at the specified location in the list.

span.para: 如果超出允许的值的范围 (之间零和-1)，则将返回越界错误。
If is outside the range of the allowed values (between zero and -1), then an out-of-bounds error will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HideSelection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 指定是显示还是隐藏控件控件失去焦点时的选择。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies if a selection is displayed or hidden for the control when the control loses focus.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性的默认值为True。
The default value of this property is True.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ListCount As Integer
public: property int ListCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回整数(C# 中int ) 值，该值指定的元素数在下拉列表中的组合框控件。

span.span: Returns an Integer (int in C#) value that specifies the number of elements in the drop-down list of the combo box control.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 默认值为零，表示列表中没有任何项目。
The default value is zero, indicating that there are no items in the list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ListIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 (C# 中int ) 的整数值，该值指示当前所选元素的组合框列表中的位置控件。

span.span: Reurns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value that indicates the location of the currently selected element in the list of the combo box control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: ListIndex是编入列表中的项的数组的索引从零开始的值。 默认值为-1，指示未选定任何项。
ListIndex is a zero-based value indexing into the array of items in the list. The default value is -1, indicating that no item is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Locked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 的指定控件处于锁定状态而被更改。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies whether or not the control is locked from being changed.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为False。
当控件处于锁定状态时，该控件不具有"禁用"外观，但是用户不能编辑控件的内容。
The default value is False.
When the control is locked, the control does not have a "disabled" appearance, but the user cannot edit the contents of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个指定的最大字符数的整数(C# 中int ) 值此控件。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value that specifies the maximum number of characters for the of this control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为零，这仅意味着此控件已定义的值的最大长度没有。最大长度仍可能在基于可用内存或其他因素的位置。
The default value is zero, which only means that no maximum length for the value has been defined for this control. A maximum length may still be in place based on available memory or other factors.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property stdole::StdPicture ^ MouseIcon { stdole::StdPicture ^ get(); void set(stdole::StdPicture ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 StdPicture 表示此控件的鼠标光标的自定义图片。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a StdPicture that represents a custom picture to the mouse cursor for this control. Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。
The default value is Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlMousePointer MousePointer { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlMousePointer get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlMousePointer value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定的用户将鼠标放在控件上时显示的指针类型的常量。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant that specifies the type of pointer displayed when the user positions the mouse over the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为olMousePointerDefault。
The default value is olMousePointerDefault.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Paste() runtime managed

summary.span: 将剪贴板的内容粘贴到控件中。

span.span: Pastes the contents of the clipboard in the control.

span.para: 格式文本格式粘贴剪贴板的内容。
此方法不会粘贴任何内容时控件的为olComboBoxStyleListBox。
The contents of the clipboard are pasted in unformatted text.
This method does not paste anything when the control's is olComboBoxStyleListBox.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveItem([in]int32 Index) runtime managed

param.name: Index
param.span: 编入列表中项目数组的索引的值，从零开始计数。

span.span: A zero-based value indexing into the array of items in the list.

summary.span: 从列表中删除指定的项目。

span.span: Removes the specified item from the list.

span.para: 如果超出允许的值的范围 (之间零和-1)，则将返回越界错误。
If is outside the range of the allowed values (between zero and -1), then an out-of-bounds error will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SelectionMargin { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 指定用户是否可以通过单击文本左侧区域中选择的文本行。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies whether the user can select a line of text by clicking in the region to the left of the text.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 如果，则返回 True，单击页边距区域造成选中文本。 如果False，此操作没有选择任何文本。默认值为False。
If True, clicking in the margin causes selection of text. If False, this action does not select any text. The default value is False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置当前选定内容中指定的字符数的整数(C# 中int ) 值。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value that specifies the number of characters in the current selection.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 指定当前选定内容，这是该控件的一部分。最大值是可支持的字符数。
的默认值为零，这意味着当前未选定任何文本。
SelLength属性始终是有效的即使该控件不具有焦点。
设置SelLength为小于 0 的值将导致出错。 尝试在将SelLength设置为MaxLength设置的值大于MaxLength结果。
The current selection is specified by , which is a portion of the control's . The maximum number of characters that can be supported for Value is .
The default value is zero, which means no text is currently selected.
The SelLength property is always valid, even when the control does not have focus.
Setting SelLength to a value less than zero causes an error. Attempting to set the value greater than MaxLength results in setting SelLength to MaxLength.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelStart { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个整数(C# 中int ) 值，指定所选文本的起始点或插入点如果未不选择任何文本。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value that specifies either the starting point of the selected text or the insertion point if no text has been selected.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 指定当前选定内容，这是该控件的一部分。最大值是可支持的字符数。
的默认值为零，这意味着没有选择文本并且插入点位于开头。
SelStart属性始终是有效的即使该控件不具有焦点。 SelStart设置为值小于零会出现错误。 将SelStart设置为一个值大于MaxLength将SelStart重置为MaxLength。 更改SelStart的值取消任何现有选择，将插入点放在文本中，并将SelLength属性设置为零。
The current selection is specified by , which is a portion of the control's . The maximum number of characters that can be supported for Value is .
The default value is zero, which means no text is selected and the insertion point is at the beginning.

The SelStart property is always valid, even when the control does not have focus. Setting SelStart to a value less than zero causes an error. Setting SelStart to a value greater than MaxLength will reset SelStart to MaxLength. Changing the value of SelStart cancels any existing selection, places the insertion point in the text, and sets the SelLength property to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelText As String
public: property System::String ^ SelText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值，该值代表选定的部分的组合框的值。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) that represents the selected portion of the value of the combo box.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: SelText代表当前所选内容，是控件的一部分。最大值是可支持的字符数。
的默认值为空字符串。
SelText represents the current selection, which is a portion of the control's . The maximum number of characters that can be supported for Value is .
The default value is an empty string.

public: void SetItem(int Index, System::String ^ Item);

param.name: Index
param.span: 从零开始计数的值，指定项目在列表中的位置。

span.span: A zero-based value that specifies the location of an item in the list.

param.name: Item
param.span: 要用于更新列表中指定位置的值。

span.span: The value to be used to update the list at the specified location.

span.span: Sets the item at the specified location in the list of the combo box to the specified value.

span.para: 如果超出允许的值的范围 (之间零和-1)，则将返回越界错误。
If is outside the range of the allowed values (between zero and -1), then an out-of-bounds error will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlComboBoxStyle Style { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlComboBoxStyle get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlComboBoxStyle value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常量指定如何用户可以选择或设置控件的值。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant to specify how the user can choose or set the control's value.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为olComboBoxStyleCombo。
The default value is olComboBoxStyleCombo.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串），为控件中显示的文本。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) that is the text displayed in the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: Text属性的默认值为空字符串。
Text属性与提供的值相同属性，但是该值强类型化为String （C# 中的字符串）。
The default value of the Text property is the empty string.
The Text property provides the same value as the property, but the value is strongly typed as a String (string in C#).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlTextAlign TextAlign { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlTextAlign get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlTextAlign value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定文本中控件的对齐方式的常量。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant that specifies how text is aligned in the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为olTextAlignLeft从左到右语言，例如英语。
The default value is olTextAlignLeft in left-to-right languages such as English.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TopIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个代表组合框列表中的显示部分顶部的项目的索引的整数(C# 中int ) 值。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value that represents the index of the item at the top of the displayed portion of the list in the combo box.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 如滚动列表和顶部的列表项将被更改，此属性的值将更改以反映当前列表的顶部显示的项。
索引值是从零开始的。默认值为-1，指示应应用任何特殊的顺序。
As the list scrolls, the item at the top of the list will change, and the value of this property will change to reflect the item currently displayed at the top of the list.
The index value is zero-based. The default value is -1, indicating that no special ordering should be applied.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public Property Value As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个对象，表示由控件显示为列表中选定的内容。

span.span: Returns or sets an Object that represents the content selected in the list displayed by the control.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 值是相同的值、 在于此属性是对象类型而Text强类型化为String （C# 中的字符串）。
The value is the same as the value of , except that this property is Object and Text is strongly typed as String (string in C#).
